1.content: So Scooby, what movie deserves a sequel?
1.title: What movie gets the Sequel?

11.content:
The basic Summary of the movie is this:

Count Dracula has a race that features all of the monsters of legand. However, his big star, The Werewolf, had decided to retire to some beach, and not race anymore. Dracula used a book to find out who the next werewolf was, which turned out to be Shaggy, who is a racecar driver from America.

Dracula then sent his henchmen, The Hunch Bunch, aka Brunch and Crunch, to go turn Shaggy into a werewolf. After several attempts, which were foiled by Shaggy's best friend/pet dog Scooby-Doo, the Hunch Bunch managed to turn Shaggy into a werewolf. The Neferius Duo then transported Shaggy, his girlfriend Googie, Scooby, and Scrappy to Transalvania where Dracula makes a deal with Shaggy: If the American won the Big Race, Dracula would turn the guy back to normal, and send him, his girlfriend, and his dogs, back home.

Shaggy agreed to the deal, but Dracula had his fangs crossed, and ordered the Hunch Bunch to do everything they could to prevent Shaggy from winning. Despite the efforts of the Hunch Bunch, Dracula, and other monsters, Shaggy manages to win the race. Dracula however, refused to honor his deal, and soon there was game of "Steal and Keep Away" involving the Book of Monsters and Spells, which would turn Shaggy back to normal.

Shaggy and his friends managed to get the book and get home, where Googie helped turn Shaggy turn back into a human. However, just before the movie ended, Dracula and The Hunch Bunch showed up outside the window saying, "We're Back!"

So, what character's view will the story be from?
11.title: The Reluctant Werewolf (What Character are you?)

choices: He was dead on. (Shaggy's turning into a werewolf.)
He hit the wrong target. (Googie's turning.)
112.content:
"Alright you two," Dracula said, as he turned to his minions, the Hunch Bunch. "I want the two of you to turn Shah-Gee back into a werewolf, or else!"

"Um Master, are you sure that we can turn Shaggy back into a werewolf?" the English sounding Brunch asked. "I mean, he did say the counter-spell, speaking it poorly if I might add, and now he's back to being normal."

"Of course I'm sure," Dracula said. "Since he was turned into a werewolf once, he will always turn into a werewolf."

"Bult blaster, bla bloon biz bout ob blosition blo blake bla blarewolf," said the blabbering Crunch said, pointing at the moon.

"What?" Dracula asked.

"What my friend is saying is, the moon is not in the right position to work," Brunch said, translating his partner's words.

Dracula looked at the moon. "That was only for the initial transformation," he said. "But now that Shah-Gee has been a werewolf, whenever the moon hit his skin, he will change into a werewolf. Of course, once the Sun comes up, he'll turn back into a human. The trick is casting the spell that will make the transformation permanent, and it must be done when he is a werewolf, or else he'll never turn into a werewolf again, and we'll have to wait until the next candidate is born, in three hundred years, and I don't plan to wait that long."

"Understood Master," Brunch said. "We'll get to work on it." With that, the two hunchbacked monsters took off.

"Those fools," Dracula said as he took out a small pocketbook and began to read one of the chapters. "I'm just glad I found the contingency spell in the 'Monster Pocket Book'. Let's see, 'Once transformed into a werewolf, the subject will always turn when the moon hits their skin. Also, there is a way to make the transformation permanent.' Now that I like. 'See page 456 of the "Pocket Spell Book".' What? That's just great! I don't have the spell book on me." Dracula then threw the book at the ground, one of the pages exposed.

Moments later, the Hunch Bunch showed up with a ladder.

"Alright, get that thing in position," Dracula shouted.

"Master, you might wish to tone it down," Brunch said as he and Crunch positioned the ladder. "After all, you don't want to wake them up before we transform Shaggy back into a werewolf."

"Hmph! We'll get him, one way, or another," Dracula said, as he saw that the ladder was in position. "I'll go up first, and make sure that it is done right." With that, he took hold of the rungs, and began climbing up.

"Hey Master, just to let you know, we did cut a hole in the roof when we were trying to turn him the first time," Brunch said. "You could use that to turn him."

"That's a good idea Brunch," Dracula said, as he peeked into the bedroom window, where he saw Shaggy and Googie snuggling in a bed. "Oh I'll get him for making a fool of me."

Finally, he made it to the roof, when he heard something coming from Crunch. He looked down and asked, "What does that mushmouth want?"

"He just wants me to read this passage from this book he found," Brunch said.

"Well, go ahead," Dracula said, as he pulled himself onto the roof, and began to look for the disturbed portion of the roof. "It won't do any harm to read it." He then spotted the disturbed portion and began to remove it.

"Wait Master!" Brunch shouted, just as Dracula removed the plug, allowing moonlight to enter the room.

"What is it?" Dracula asked as he walked back to the edge of the roof.

"Master, the book says that the curse can be transferred if someone is holding onto the chosen one when the moonlight hits the other person."

"Oh no," Dracula said, as he crept back to the hole. "Tell me I didn't mess up." He then took a look into the hole and saw that...
112.title: Dracula

choices: "No, we're going to have fun with him."
1121.content:
Dracula chuckled wickedly as he saw Shaggy start to turn. "About time a plan of mine worked," he said as he went to the ladder and started climbing down.

"Did we get him?" Brunch asked.

"No you mean did I get him, and the answer is Yes!" Dracula said with a laugh.

"Blo, blu be blecth blim?" Crunch blathered.

"What?"

"He wants to know if we are to catch him now," Brunch translated.

Dracula smiled widely, exposing his fangs.
1121.title: The Moon hit Shaggy

choices: "We'll have fun with them as well."
11213.content:
"No, we're going to have fun with him," Dracula said. "I want him to come crawling to my feet. I want to hear him beg for sanctuary at my castle, and I want to see the look on his face when I tell him 'No.' That will be a greater revenge than capturing him."

"So, what do we do?" Brunch asked.

"You mean what I'll do!" Dracula shouted. "I'll give him and several of his friends tickets to Hawaii. At some point he'll turn- and his friends won't want to be with him. Then I'll use the Permanent Werewolf spell on him, and he'll be stuck that way forever."

"Sounds like a good plan," Brunch said. "But what if his friends won't leave him, and try to find a cure?"

Dracual smiled evilly and said...
11213.title: "No, we're going to have fun with him.&...

choices: A giantess she grew in size
114.content:
"Alright you numbskulls this time we're turning that young racecar driver into a werewolf for good!" Dracula announces to his minions.

"But sire he already won the race and besides he now has the book!" The smart hunchback Brunch stated firmly.

"I know that dolt! Luckily I happen to remember the counter curse ahem..." As the king of vampires began to read aloud from a rag sheet of paper "By All Hallows' Eve I command you by the light of the full moon-wait there is a full moon tonight right?" As he paused and looked up into the night sky soon enough there it was half hidden in the clouds but still visible "Good okay where was I? Now then I command you turn Shaggy back into a...WHAT CRUNCH YOU MORON! YOU'RE DROOLING ALL OVER THE PAPER I CAN'T READ A THING!"

"Whoops sorry master!" The dimwitted hunchback said as he sprayed his master with endless spit.

"Ahhhh enough! Now you ruined it completely! I can't read it now! I can't even see the words! Brunch do you have the spare?"

"Hmmmm? Oh yes sir got it right here!" As he gave him a another piece of paper which Dracula began to read out loud from holding it a great length from Crunch in case he started spitting while speaking again.

"Now I have to start over part 1 by the hidden power of one's heart turn them into a hideous beast only by...hey wait a minute this is the wrong manuscript Brunch where's the other one? The spare?" He ordered.

"Sorry sire left it back at the castle but what's wrong with this one?"

"It's designed to transform a female into a hideous monster you dolt! I don't want that girlfriend of Shaggy's turning into a werewolf I want Shaggy himself back into a furry form! Oh terrific I'll have to head back to the castle to get that spare piece you two find a way to get that book from Shaggy and his friends until I return!" With that he vanished into a bat and flew off into the night as inside the house Shaggy, Scooby, Scrappy and Googie thought they at last were safe from the Count and his horde of monsters.

"Finally thank goodness it's over guys well goodnight to you all!" Shaggy announced as he went to bed Scooby and Scrappy followed as Googie herself prepared to go on home as she and Shaggy had a date early tomorrow night.

Crunch thought to himself, "This is my one chance to get something right for a change the master said he wanted a monster and since this manuscript is designed for a female I'll just transform Shaggy's girlfriend into a female werewolf what harm could it do?"

As Brunch was busy thinking of a clever plan to steal back the magical book the dumber monster snuck behind Googie as she was just getting into her car and silently finished the enchantment at once the words took effect Crunch silently celebrated as Googie felt her body changing in some odd way but what exactly did she become?
114.title: Googie

1141.content: Googie woke up dizzy and went to the bathroom and saw herself and scream litte did she know that someone was spying on her.
1141.title: A female werewolf

1143.content:
http://www.deviantart.com/art/GTS-Googie-489151126

"Uh Oh!" Crunch thought as by the sudden shouts of surprise Shaggy's main squeeze was slowly growing taller quickly filling up her car.

Brunch upon seeing what just occurred cried out "Oh no Crunch what did you do?"

As they watched Googie slowly outgrowing her car crying out "Hey what's going on? What's happening?" As POP! Ka-Booom! The entire car exploded with Googie reaching nearly fifty feet tall she looked around in utter disbelief "OH NO! I'M A MONSTER!" She cried.

"Crunch what have you done? We were supposed to turn her into a werewolf not a fifty foot tall freak of nature!" Brunch scolded.

"Whoops sorry!" Crunch muttered just as Dracula reappeared out of nowhere apparently not noticing a thing as he panted for breath.

"Gasp man it took forever for me to make it back here! I hate air travel and flying all the way here as a bat really takes the energy out of me! Well boys you'll be happy to know I got the right spell this time roun.....Holy- Wha...WHAT'S THAT?" He gasped as he pointed at Googie still looking around in shock unfortunately she was incredibly large and filled half the street for anyone to look out of their house and notice a fifty foot girl out in the neighborhood "Is that Shaggy's girlfriend? What-her-name how did she get like this?"

The Count panted frantically as the smarter hunchback explained. "Umm you see sire Crunch thought he could do things on his own and used the first spell on her hoping it would turn her into a werewolf and..."

But now Dracula was really mad and annoyed as he threw a bit of a temper tantrum. "No, no I can't do anything with a female werewolf much less a girl's who fifty feet tall it has to be Shaggy himself you numbskulls! Now our plan is ruined completely what are we going to do now?" He pouted.

"Hmmm put her in a circus and make a lot of money perhaps sire?" Brunch asked "You never know sire this could be better than a dingy ole werewolf yes Shaggy's girlfriend could join our..."

But Dracula whispered harshly "Shut up fool she's looking this way! Quick hide don't let her see you no telling what she will do to us!" As again he turned into a bat and flew away as the Hunch Brunch also high-tailed it out of there as for Googie once she got over her shock of being a giantess she thought. "Maybe this isn't as bad as it appears I could get used to this!" With that she begins to head towards the sparkling outline of the nearby city but what is her current personality?
1143.title: A giantess she grew in size

choices: Dracula comes and turns Shaggy into a ware wolf again.
The Military manages to follow them somehow.
11431.content:
Then, she was heading to the city. Now in a friendly mood, trying to figure out what to do in her giant size before she finds a way to be back to normal. And when she approached the city, that's when trouble began.

When her big feet entered the city, the people looked in shock and running from her. Googie started to worry, and tried to reason with them. It's not every day that a giant good natured woman is in a city.

She said "Wait! I'm not going to hurt you! I just need help!" The people didn't listen and the running and screaming continues. She is now wandering, doing her best to not step on any cars, and good for her she isn't stepping on any people. She tired to reason with everyone. But people are still scared of the big giant. She said "Wait! Please! I'm friendly, I swear!" But then she got hit by missiles. "Ow! Please! I'm not a threat!" She tried to reason, but the army keeps firing.

Scooby, Shaggy, and Scrappy arrived just in time to see a giant 50 ft Googie. This made all the boys blush, even Scrappy, but their main mission right now is to help her. Scooby said "Row Rid Rhe Ret Ro Riant? (How did she get so giant?)"

Scrappy said "I don't know, Uncle Scooby. But it seems she's in danger." Shaggy says "Then what are we waiting for!? We gotta help her!" Then they all ran off to help the poor big girl. The boys got the red van and drove straight over to the scene.

Then the army kept firing, now Googie was scared as she feel to the ground. Now hurting and not feeling good. She said "Please...I'm not going...to hurt you..." the fires kept gong and going and the army got a big net and caught her. She said "Please...I'm just trying...to get help...I...need...help..." then she finally fainted. The army sighed. The general said "Phew. Well thank goodness that's over. Come on, boys. Let's take her Area 51." Then the city cheers as the army took away the giant Googie. The boys were too late, they were gone.

Shaggy cried "Googie! No!" Scooby and Scrappy said "Googie!" Then the boys went back to the house and started to think where she could be. Shaggy said "How did she get so big? Like, that's so not normal!" Scooby said "Ruh? Raybe ra ronster rid ris? (Uh? Maybe a monster did this?)" Scrappy said "Maybe Uncle Scooby. But we need to help our friend! Come on!" Then they got to their red van and drove to find her.

Then, Dracula and Brunch and Crunch started to follow. Dracula said "Hurry! We can't lose them!" They went to their car and started to follow the red van all the way. Brunch said "This wouldn't have happened if you just listened, Brunch!" Brunch said "Oh yeah? Well what were you doing?" They argued and argued and Dracula sighed. Dracula said "This is going to be a long night." Then they drove off.

Then the gang finally arrived at Area 51. The boys made sure they would not be seen in the area. They put their red van in invisible mode, which was added during catching the 13 ghosts saga. Then they got in, and went to find their friend. They started to worry their going to keep her here forever, since this is Area 51. Then they got to the section saying "Big 50 ft Woman". The boys cheered. Shaggy said "We found her!" Scooby and Scrappy said "Let's go!" Then they went in the doors. They now see her laying on the ground in a container. Googie was now in tears as she layed down. She still had her clothes on, but her skirt was noticeably different, there was something she was wearing underneath, it was a big diaper. They must have put it on her, to make sure if she needed the bathroom, it wouldn't be a big accident. Then the boys turned off camouflage mode and Googie opened her eyes as she smiled to see the boys. She got to her knees and got to them. She said "Boys! Thank goodness you came!"

Then, they got her out of there and out of Area 51. But not before getting the other giant diapers, as they had their red van cuffed on two big cars. One was Googie, and the other a big pack of big white diapers. And it worked as they were all in invisible mode. Then they got to a forest, where they were safe. Then the boys turned off invisible mode. They got to Googie as she picked them up and hugged them. Googie said "Thanks for saving me. But now what do we do?" The boy smiled as did she. Scrappy said "Don't worry Googie. We'll find a way to get you back to normal."
11431.title: Friendly

choices: Googie noticed the gang’s roughness with Scrappy.
114313.content:
Scooby and Shaggy then got out their phones and called their friends, Mystery Incorporated.

Fred and Velma were relaxing at Daphne’s place, after the gang got the first 12 ghosts, Flim-Flam suddenly disappeared. The gang decided to take a break from ghost hunting in search of Flim-Flam, Daphne went back to Fred and Velma, while Shaggy, Scooby and Scrappy were on their own. Unfortunately, no luck so far. For Shaggy, Scooby and Scrappy, what they thought they found him was instead the Boo Brothers, the Ghoul School, and even Dracula. Fred, Daphne and Velma didn’t have any luck either. Daphne had all of her sisters look over the world to find him, since they were popular, sadly, there was no sign of the boy.

Fred and Velma went over to Daphne’s room, they found her very sad, looking at a picture. It was the gang when they were chasing the 13 ghosts, there was Scooby and Scrappy, Shaggy and Vincent, and there was Daphne, holding Flim-Flam, enjoying the child’s company. She started to sob again, wondering if the poor boy was kidnapped.

Fred and Velma went over to her and conformed her with hugs. Fred said “It’s ok, Daphne. We’re not going to give up.” Velma said “We’ll find him someday, Daphne. We’ll get him back, we promise.” Daphne said in tears “I hope so. The boy was so sweet, how could he suddenly vanish?” She hugged her friends for a few minutes, then she wiped her tears as they heard their phone rang.

Velma got up and answer it “Hello?” Shaggy said “Velma! Is us!” Velma then smiled “Shaggy! Scooby!...and Scrappy...what’s up?” Scooby said “Re Reed Relp! Rome Ro Ra Rorest rand rell rexplain ronce rour rhere.”(We need help! Come to the forest and we’ll explain one your there.) Scrappy said “Hurry, Velma! The military and monsters are after us!” Velma said “Don’t worry! We’re on our way!” She hanged up and ran to Fred and Daphne. Velma said “We need to help the boys! They’re in some trouble! The military and monsters are chasing them!” They shocked those two, just as much as it shocked Velma.

Daphne said “Then let’s get to the Mystery Machine! What trouble did those boys get into now?” Fred said “I don’t know, Daphne, but by what Velma just said, it’s serious! Come on!” They left Daphne’s house and drove off in the Mystery Machine, then when they got to the forest, they saw the boys. Fred and Velma said “Shaggy!” Daphne said “Scooby!” They hugged their friends, happy they were still alright. Shaggy said “Freddy! Velma!” Scooby said “Raphne!” They smiled as they nervously chucked. Shaggy said “Come on, we’ll show you what our problem is.” They led them over to a giant diapered Googie, giving Scrappy some hand rides, he was enjoying them. When he saw the boys came back with their friends, the other 3 blushed as they saw the thing before them. Googie said “Hi guys. Nice day isn’t it?...” she laughed nervously. Daphne said “Googie what happened to you?” Scrappy came down to explain. “Maybe it was Dracula and his monsters? They meant to turn her into a werewolf, but they did something wrong.” Then, Fred, Daphne and Velma got a nervous feeling, they recently got a little rough around Scrappy. Shaggy and Scooby took him in and they were dealing with him just fine. Let’s just hope they do the same too, anyways, they understand and Fred prepared some traps for the military and monsters, while Daphne and Velma did some research on how to get Googie back to normal.
114313.title: Call Mystery Incorporated.

12.content:
Basic Summary of movie:

Shaggy, Scooby, and the gang are stuck in a town when their van brakes down.They find out that Aliens have been stealing cattle and abducting people. One night, Shaggy and Scooby are abducted and chased by several aliens. The duo manage to escape somehow, and in the morning they are found by a hippie woman named Crystal and her golden lab Amber, and the pair fall in love with them.

Eventually, the gang splits up, with Shaggy and Scooby going with Crystal and Amber, and the others checking out a lead. Crystal tells Shaggy that she and Amber work for the government, and that they are checking out reports of the going-ons in the area. Shaggy tells her that it wouldn't be a problem, as he and his friends check out mysteries all the time.

Meanwhile, Fred and the girls find out that there is an illegal mining operation going on, and end up getting captured by the "aliens" who are really a couple of lab assistants and some friends of theirs, who pretend to be MPs, Crystal and Amber reveal that they are really aliens from another planet, They and Shaggy and Scooby go and save Fred and the girls, and defeat the fake aliens and MPs.

Crystal then tells Shaggy that she and Amber have to leave, and that a long distance relationship would be hard to maintain, and leaves Shaggy in a sad state, until Valma finds a box of Scooby Snacks.

So, who are you?
12.title: The Alien Invaders (Who are You?)

choices: One of the Gang's point of view.
13.content:
In this movie, Scooby and the gang have seemed to have split up, but due to their presant situations, decide to team up to solve mysteries in Louisiana.

Slight problem: All the monsters are revealed to be "Bad Guys in Masks", which distresses Daphne, as she and Fred, who currently work at a News station, are searching for "Real Monsters".

A Young woman, Lena, overhears this, tells them that the place she works for is haunted, which gets the hopes of the gang up (except for Scooby and Shaggy.) Taking a ferry, the group heads to Moonscar Island, which was named after a legendary pirate. As it turns out, (in a running gag) the place is full of cats, and Scooby, being a dog, has trouble dealing with them.

After some strange going ons, Scooby, Shaggy, and the rest of the gang, discover that the island has lots, and lots, of zombies, which come from all walks of life, and from over a span of approximately three hundred years, including pirates, Confederate soldiers, and tourists. It is revealed that Lena and her employer, along with the ferryman, are the cause of this: they are werecats who must drain souls of their victims every year so that they can live. With the help of the zombies, who the gang realizes are the Good Guys, the gang manages to prevent the werecats from draining the souls of the intended victims, the gang themselves and the gardener Beau. Cheated of their meals, the werecats' life forces expire, and they dry up into dust, which frees the zombies from their curse, and they go to their Rest.

Or, was that what really happened? What if the werecats managed to survive? What if the zombies did not go to their Rest? What if......?
13.title: Zombie Island

131.content: Which member of Mystery Inc will you follow?
131.title: One of the Gang's point of view.

1313.content: Which one of the others?
1313.title: Other members

choices: A phone call brings the gang back to Moonscar Island
Detective Beau Neville needs the gang's help in tying up some loose ends
13133.content:
It was all so simple, or at least we thought it was simple.

Some years ago, we(that is my friends Fred, Daphne, Shaggy and our Great Dane named Scooby-Doo and I) traveled to Louisiana. All we wanted to do is to find a real haunted house for our friend Daphne's TV show; but we ended up finding more then that.

Zombies, a trio of sinister cat creatures, real ghosts, a creepy old mansion... overall it was one of the scariest mysteries my friends and I had ever been involved with.

What's that? You want to know more about me, and the mysteries I was talking about? Well, I would be more then happy to tell you about it.

My name is Velma Dinkley, and I am a member of a group of detectives who go around looking for ghosts, ghouls, and monsters known as Mystery Incorporated, or Mystery Inc. for short. Well, most of the ghosts and monsters we tackle are people in masks and costumes, all of which who try and scare people away from some kind of crooked operation.

Smuggling, counterfeiting, people trying to steal valuable treasures, we've dealt with it all. Which is why we separated for a while, and did our own things, which I'll tell you more about later.

I say that because this is the story of something that rarely happens during one of our mysteries; that being a return to where we solved a case. We usually don't return to places we've been because all the loose ends are wrapped up, and the crooks are all captured, etc.

But not this time, not on this case...
13133.title: Velma's Thoughts

132.content: So, which werecat do you follow?
132.title: The Werecats

choices: They are meet at the door by someone
They enter the house without knocking because the front door was open.
How about an entirely different movie instead?
15.content:
Dusk set over the hills over looking the small valley town of Mocking bird Heights. A gentle cool wind blew leaves across the streets and into the yards of the citizens. One such house, was regarded as an eyesore to the community, and has at least a couple times been condemned, however when the city counsel found there were people living in this house, and that they indeed had a valid deed for the house and property, the city decided to save the house.

A green van drives down the road on Mocking bird lane, it spits and sputters as it pulls in front of the creepy old mansion. A young man sandy blond hair, and a goatee, looks out the windshield at the old house. He shivers as he glares at the knurled weeping willow, its branches void of its usual long vines. Shutters banged in the wind, creaking as they moved.

"Zoinks Scooby, what a creepy old house. I bet no one has lived there for a hundred years" Shaggy commented.

"Yeah yeah!" Scooby Doo said agreeing.

Just as Shaggy stepped on the accelerator, the van stopped, its engine dies. Shaggy twisted the key and attempted to start the engine, but it would not turn over.

"Oh this is lovely, on the worst night with the rain falling outside, and we are in front of the most creepiest house, yikers. Maybe there is a phone in there we can call a tow." Shaggy suggested.

Scooby dived under a blanket in the back of the van and began to shake, and his tail stuck out straight as a rod out the end of the blanket. "Na ah.. row ray!" his teeth chattering.

Shaggy smiled, "oh Scoob, you know if you are brave, there is a snack in it for you, maybe there might be something left in the cupboards that we can eat."

They both reluctently climbed out of the van, looking around, and rushed to the front door.

This is where you get to add to the story.
15.title: Another Scooby movie: Scooby Doo and the Munsters

154.content: Let's see, what other movies are there?
154.title: How about an entirely different movie instead?

choices: Shaggy and Scooby stay/return to teach the new set of monster girls
A Human student gets enrolled into the ghoul school by mistake
1542.content:
Basic Summary:

Shaggy gets a job as a gym teacher for Miss Grimwood's Finishing School for Girls, and brings Scooby and Scrappy with him. However, it seems that the school is actually for the daughters of several famous monsters- Sibella, the daughter of Count Dracula, Elsa Frankenteen- Frankenstein, Winnie- Werewolf, Phantasma- Phantom of the Opera, and Tanis- The Mummy. There is also Matches, a small temperamental dragon.

The school is competing against the Calloway Military School in volleyball (but have never won). With help from Shaggy, as well as Scooby accidentally eating the boys' volleyball remote, the girls manage to beat the cadets. However, an evil monster named Revolta plots to kidnap the girls for her own selfish reasons.

At the Open House, Shaggy meets up with the girls' fathers, who promptly warn him of what would happen to him, should anything happen to their beloved daughters.

The next day, while out on a field trip in the Swamp, Revolta launches her attack, kidnapping the girls. Shaggy then goes to rescue them. After dealing with various traps and fiends, Shaggy, with some help from Matches and his dogs, and the Cadets, manages to save the girls, and get away from Revolta's castle before it explodes.

Later, the school has another party, and the parents thank Shaggy for keeping their daughters safe. Miss Grimwood then says that the new students have arrived. Shaggy however, says that he has to go, and takes off, with the girls waving Good-Bye.
1542.title: Scooby-Doo and The Ghoul School

choices: Alternative Ending, stay at the school
Return there at a much later date
15421.content:
Will this be like an alternative ending where Shaggy and Scooby stay for the new set of monster girls?

Or will Shaggy and Scooby return to the school later on?
15421.title: Shaggy and Scooby stay/return to teach the new ...

choices: They get to the School without incident
154212.content:
Shaggy turned on the windshield wipers, and turned on the high beams. The gentle "pat, pat" of a Summer shower had changed to the loud "Thunk, thunk" of hail. He pressed the down button for the window, and tried to see outside. "We're nearly there guys," he said.

"How do you know that?" Fred asked, as he took a look out his own window. "I can't see a thing through this."

"That's how I know we're almost there," Shaggy said with a chuckle. "It was storming when I worked there five years ago. Remember Scoob."

"Yeayea," the Great Dane said. "Big storm."

"Well, why did you bring us with you?" Velma asked. "I mean, we weren't with you when you worked there."

"There was some trouble when I worked there five years back," Shaggy said. "Some crazy old lady kidnapped the girls- you don't want to know what I had to go through to get them back."

"You no want to know," Scooby said with a shiver. "I hate toads."

"Well, since the girls are teenagers, I might be able to give them some fashion tips," Daphne said, as she added a touch of blush to her face.

"Well here's some tips for you guys," Shaggy said. "Don't go for a swim in the moat, and don't eat the food until you know for sure what's in it- though you might not want to eat it afterwards anyway."

"I agree," said Scooby.

Daphne, Fred, and Velma looked at each other- given how Shaggy and Scooby could eat almost anything- the pair telling them that there was something up with the food was a clear warning.

"So, what's going on?" Fred asked.

"Oh, just a party," Shaggy said, as he got the invite out of his pocket. "Just a party."
154212.title: Return there at a much later date

choices: Shaggy and Fred get the Van straightened out
Shaggy's old Students come out to help.
1542122.content:
Crash! the gang jerked forward, and then back into their seats, though Scooby ended up on the windshield.

"Looks like we're here," Shaggy said as he opened the door. "Hey Fred, mind giving me a hand."

"Sure thing Shaggy," Fred said as he opened up his own door. "Um Shag, I think you parked next to a cliff's edge."

Shaggy walked around the front of the van. "I guess Miss Grimwood's been renovating the place. Come out the driver's side guys."

As the gang got out of the van, Daphne and Velma looked at the two buildings, one saying "Calloway Military School" and the other saying "Miss Grimwood's Finishing School of Ghouls".

"I'm guessing that Miss Grimwood has a strange sense of humor," Daphne said with a giggle.

"You could call it that," Shaggy said as he and Fred struggled to get the van back on the road. "Just keep your things from Matches- friendly little guy, but he'll make a mess out of them."

"Yeayea," Scooby said. "Matches makes ashes."
1542122.title: They made it.

Great choice, but who will be the star of this sequel?

15432.title: Scooby-Doo! and the Goblin King

154322.content: Does she go into the monster 's world? Or somewhere else?
154322.title: Daphne's adventure

choices: Fall down a rabbit hole (Wonderland story)
1543222.content:
In the monster kingdom, pacifically the castle of the Goblin King. He is currently watching the former "Amazing" Krudsky scrubbing the royal bath tub. "And don't forget," The Goblin King snarled. "You still need to wash the the clean the gutter!"

"Yes master," Krudsky sighed as he continued his work. "Good, I have other busy to attend to," He grinned before leaving. Unknown to to either of them, Princess Willow was from behind a bottle of shampoo. No longer grounded for the trouble she caused last smiled, with her father busy she can have some fun. She tip a the bottle onto the magician's head.

-------------

Back in Coolsville, Halloween is here once again. the sun is about to set and the streets are full of people young and old dress up. In the home of Daphne Blake, her father is reading the local new paper. Unknown to him, his daughter comes into the room.

"So Daddy, what do you think?" Her father puts down his paper and looked at her.

(Here's her costume for this story http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bsnnwcKJQ...

"Very nice dress my dear. But don't you think you're a little old to go trick-or-treating?" He answered.

"Dad Im going to the costume charity concert at the mall. I even won some backstage passes for me and my friends." She explained.

"That's nice, be back before midnight," He added. "Thanks daddy," Daphne said with a hug before she rushed out the door. But unknown to this pretty redhead, she will have a wondrous adventure,

------------

What should happen to her?
1543222.title: Your choice

15432221.content:
Daphne was heading down the road to concert. She carried a pumpkin shaped handbag which contained the backstage passes. Unknown to her, she was under a tree where Willow and her friends fairies Sparkplug, Honeybee and Tiddlywink sat.

"It's good to be free again," The fairy princess smiled. "Hey Willow, catch," Sparkplug yelled as he threw a dandelion. It hit her in the face.

Honeybee giggled, "Oh you are in big trouble." The princess is about to scold him but stops. "Ah-ah-ah.." The other three fairies grew fearful. She was about to sneeze, and when a fairy sneezes. Impossible things happens.

"Ah-ah-ah-CHOO!" Willow sneezed, causing a magic hole to appeared right under Daphne Blake.

------------

Daphne screams as she fell through the hole. Things had happened so fast that she didn't have time to ask where that hole came from. And with a loud thud, she landed in a what looks like a underground tunnel.

"Thank goodness that's over," Daphne said as she sat up. "Where am I And for that matter, how do I get back?" She felt something tap her shoulder. She turned her head to see a white rabbit.

(Here's what the White Rabbit looks like, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kTHpKrRqI...

'Hi," The White rabbit the smiled. "Oh my," Daphne responded.

"Hi, I'm a dragon," The rabbit smiled. "A dragon? You look like a rabbit," She added. "Darn, two points for you," The rabbit took out a notepad and wrote something down.

"Say how would I have gone with alligator?" He questioned. "Alligator? What are you talking about?." The pretty red head muttered.

"Double darn, two more points for you." He continued.

"I don't have time for games, I need to get back to Coolsville" She snapped.

"Very well," The rabbit sighed. He pointed to a door with the words, "To Coolsville" written on it. "Now could you excuse me, I m on a scavenger hunt and I need a pumpkin shaped...Oh there's one."

She suddenly remembered that her handbag as well. "My bag, where is it?" She panicked. The backstage passes were in those bags. She looks up and see it in the hands of the rabbit, "One pumpkin shaped handbag," He smiled before he ran down the tunnel.

"Wait! That's mine!" Daphne screamed. She quickly hurried after him. Eventually she found another so small she had to get on her hands and knees to get through. On the other side was a massive hallway with many doors, and a glass table.

----------

Now it's up to you. Does she shrink or grow?
15432221.title: Down the rabbit hole (Wonderland story)

info.brief_description: Make a sequel to your favorite Scooby-Doo movie. 3,380+ views
info.description:
Got a favorite Scooby-Doo movie that you think deserves a sequel? Write it here.

Third Person Point of View is recommended.

Anything goes, just keep it at around 13+.

For References on movies and characters, see the following links.
http://scoobydoo.wikia.com/wiki/Scoobypedia
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scooby-Doo
